sentences.sContent: There is no inherent right to some particular quantity of any commodity whether it’s oil, gold, coffee, or Danish pastry.
sentences.sContent_eng: There is no inherent right to some particular quantity of any commodity whether it’s oil, gold, coffee, or Danish pastry.
sentences.sCn: 任何一种商品的具体数量本身是没有正确性的，不论它是石油，黄金，咖啡或者丹麦点心。

sentences.sContent: Like all Danish students, they study for free and receive a monthly stipend equivalent to about $900 per person from the government.
sentences.sContent_eng: Like all Danish students, they study for free and receive a monthly stipend equivalent to about $900 per person from the government.
sentences.sCn: 和其他丹麦学生一样，他们免费学习，并且每人每月可从政府领取约合900美元的津贴。

sentences.sContent: Here you can see equipment of the Danish company Danfoss.
sentences.sContent_eng: Here you can see equipment of the Danish company Danfoss.
sentences.sCn: 在这里你可以看到丹麦丹佛斯公司的设备。

trans.tranCn: 丹麦的；丹麦人的；丹麦语（文）的
trans.tranOther: relating to Denmark, its people, or its language
